item.title: By: Shantnu

item.description: okay, I've turned off sanitisation, but it has to be done for each block separately. If you find any more problems, moan about it and I'll fix it :)

item.title: By: Shantnu
item.dc:creator: Shantnu
item.description:
Oh boy. It's "sanitised" everything!
I haven't looked at this code for years, and I didn't even think anyone read it. Let me try to fix it :)

item.title: By: fatune
item.dc:creator: fatune
item.description: All your html code is screwed up by the parser of your site. It looks like you've made very helpfull tutorial, but It's hard to follow it with this ugly html examples. Please do something about it.
item.content:encoded: All your html code is screwed up by the parser of your site. It looks like you’ve made very helpfull tutorial, but It’s hard to follow it with this ugly html examples. Please do something about it.
